name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadCopilot - Chat with All Your Info Sources

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet ReadCopilot, your AI Reading Assistant powered by OpenAI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now, Chat with All Your Info Sources with ReadCopilot.ai! 

Have you ever felt overwhelmed by the volume of information you're supposed to read, understand, and remember? 

That's why we created ReadCopilot.ai, an AI-powered reading assistant that transforms your reading experience.

ReadCopilot.ai isn't just a summarization tool - it's a complete reading companion. You can chat with all your info resources: selected texts, entire webpages, uploaded docs, and even RSS feeds. We leverage advanced AI technology to provide insightful conversations, crisp summarizations, and instant translations.

Our goal is to help you understand more, in less time, without the chaos. We believe ReadCopilot.ai is a step forward in making reading and learning more efficient and enjoyable.

We're looking forward to hearing your feedback. Try it out, ask us anything, and let's revolutionize reading together!

Your reading, now conversational!

---

Questions? Feedback? Reach out on Twitter @ReadCopilot or contact us at ðŸ’Œ info@readcopilot.ai
